artist: Artist: Nishimura Goun [obverse]; Artist: In the style of Mori Sosen [reverse]
creditline: Given in memory of Henry Dutton Thrall
description: obverse: roosters in the fall rice harvest; reverse: monkeys in the cherry blossoms and the young monkeys beside the stream with crab and rushes; all heavily and beautifully embroidered lifelike
medium: Ink and color on silk [obverse]; embroidery on silk [reverse]
title: Rooster and hen in the fall rice harvest [obverse]; Monkeys amidst cherry blossoms [reverse]
